text: @NYGovCuomo @NYGovCuomo  Give me a break.  No more dismal social control.  COVID19 no longer clinically there.  You will NOT control my behavior.  And since when did you care if people died of Covid 19?  Nursing homes ring a bell?  You just want TV time.
